function_call.name: classify_risks_framework
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Need for improved ventilation-related interventions to protect against controls","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Insufficient guidelines for indoor environments","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Close collaboration between
